note:
From the river to the sea, Palestine will be free!

Biologist & educator in the Netherlands. I've got a column somewhere but I'll never tell. I like (palaeo)botany, anthropology, free & open software, Chinese tea, old hifi tech and writing alt text. He/him.

fields.name: profile picture
fields.value: the face of lieutenant commander Data, laughing on a background of fern fronds.

fields.name: header image
fields.value: to the right, a tree trunk, top and bottom cut off by the frame, with a small leafy bough sprouting from it. The rest of the image contains verdant trees and shrubs, backlit by the setting sun.
